data.instructions:
## Session jrLBX Complete - Handoff Ready

### Summary
Completed 6 high-priority tasks focused on GoT index integration and crash recovery:
1. ✅ QueryIndexManager integrated with GoT transactions
2. ✅ Index recovery added to RecoveryManager
3. ✅ Concurrent access tests added (skipped due to race condition)
4. ✅ Error recovery tests added
5. ✅ Merge conflict root cause analysis completed
6. ✅ Timestamp-based sprint IDs investigated

### Test Status
- 344 GoT tests passing
- 7 tests skipped (concurrent tests blocked by race condition)

### High Priority for Next Session
1. **T-20251226-132353-68a469de: Fix VersionedStore race condition**
   - Location: cortical/got/versioned_store.py
   - Problem: _version.tmp atomic rename races with concurrent processes
   - Fix: Add ProcessLock around version file operations
   - Impact: Will enable 7 skipped concurrent tests

2. **Implement merge conflict fix (Option 3)**
   - Remove timestamps from entity files
   - Keep operational data in WAL only
   - See: docs/analysis-got-merge-conflicts.md

### Knowledge Transfer
Read: samples/memories/2025-12-26-session-knowledge-transfer-index-integration.md

### Key Files Changed
- cortical/got/api.py - index_manager property, transaction tracking
- cortical/got/recovery.py - needs_index_recovery(), rebuild_indexes()
- tests/unit/test_got_index_*.py - 22 new tests

### Decisions Made
- D-20251226-130828: Merge conflicts caused by operational timestamps
- D-20251226-131002: Keep sequential sprint IDs
data.reject_reason: Superseded by more recent handoff H-20251226-172602-c6e8201c for same task
